title: Spectacular Studio, 1 Bath in Streeterville! Contact Us Now!
map_address: East Chestnut St near Michigan Ave
posting_body: Schedule a personal tour today!This apartment is located in the distinctive Gold Coast neighborhood of Chicago, prominently situated just steps off of Michigan Avenue.
Transformed from the renowned hotel, this building is a boutique apartment community offering timeless elegance in a contemporary setting.
Be the first to live in a newly renovated studio, one bedroom or two bedroom apartment, any of which you will be proud to call your next home.
It's a pet friendly community offering a fitness center, sun deck, and laundry facility for its residents.
As a resident, you will enjoy all the conveniences that are provided just beyond your door step.
Whether you choose to shop, dine or stroll along the lake, your options are limitless.
This amazing place is full of amenities, offering a fitness center, lounge, grilling station, laundry space and bike storage area.
Residents also love the building's location, with it being proximal to the best the area has to offer, like the Museum of Contemporary Art, Lake Shore Park and Water Tower Place.
